much stronger than any mule or ox.

creature you can treat like an animal, but depend on like a man.

We are the descendants of those who remained.

Well, why haven't they come for us?
They thought they were the last thoriphants in the world, But some believe one day they will come back, marching through the fields to rescue us ten feet tall with massive arms.

proof that the Uprights really exist, that they could be out there somewhere.

they really don't exist, do they?

you need to be like Papa until he comes home.

to make thoriphants less and less of what we were intended to be.
